summary: Six friends win a vacation to the Bermuda Triangle and become trapped with only an MTV Crew to help keep them alive. They have to rescue Carmen Electra escape while they all battle the monsters on Monster Island.
cast: Carmen Electra|Daniel Letterle|Mary Elizabeth Winstead|La La Anthony|Nick Carter|Adam West|C. Ernst Harth|Cascy Beddow|Joe MacLeod|Chelan Simmons|Chris Harrison|Alana Husband|Jeff Geddis|Bruce James|Phillip Mitchell|Jacqueline Stewart|Robert Harper|Anthony Moyer|Jana Berengel|Andrea Marino|Troy Coppock|Rory Ames Coppock|Nicholas Treeshin
title: Isla misteriosa
